data: The terrace to the south of Penalva Forest lay basking in the sunshine of an early September afternoon, and the very bees which kept passing in and out from the two hives beneath the laurel shrubbery to the right seemed going about their work with most unproverbial drowsiness.
Benson, E. F. (Edward Frederic), 1867-1940; Hatherell, William, 1855-1928 [Illustrator]
